descr.p: "The First Night" is a song by American R&B singer Monica. It was written by Jermaine Dupri, Tamara Savage, Marilyn McLeod, Pam Sawyer and produced by rapper-producer Jermaine Dupri, incorporating a sample of the 1976 recording "Love Hangover," penned by Marilyn McLeod and Pam Sawyer.

Following the successful chart performances of previous singles "The Boy Is Mine" with Brandy," the song was released on July 24, 1998 as the album's second single. "The First Night" became one of Monica's biggest successes in years, topping both U.S. BillboardHot 100 and Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks chart, becoming Monica's first chart solo topper.

A remix version with rapper and also producer Jermaine "JD" Dupri and R.O.C. appeared on Monica's 1999 CD single Angel of Mine. The Jermaine "JD" Dupri-produced song was released on his hit collection Y'all Know What This Is... The Hitsin 2007.

"The First Night" was one of Monica's biggest worldwide success, reaching number one on the U.S. BillboardHot 100 and Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks charts, spenting six weeks at number-one on the chart. It, however, became Monica's sixth domestical top 10 hit of her career (following Top 10 singles "Don't Take It Personal (Just One of Dem Days)", "Before You Walk Out of My Life", "For You I Will") and her second number one single on the Billboard Hot 100 since "The Boy Is Mine" in early 1998. "The First Night" stayed in the top forty for twenty weeks and was ranked eigthteen on the Hot 100 1998 year-end charts.

The song also spent six consecutive weeks at number one on the Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks chart. It was ranked on the top ten of the Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Singles 1998 year-end charts. The song also spent one week on top of the Hot Dance Club Play chart. The song also peaked within the top ten in Canada and United Kingdom, the top 20 in New Zealand, and the top 30 in Australia and Ireland.

In the music video, Monica is seen dancing in a tight, white top and long khaki pants with a crowd of dancers. Throughout the video, there are cuts of Monica standing up in a white dress & sitting down on a long couch holding a camera. Other cuts show boys on the couch then girls on the couch & Monica on the couch with her lover. The instrumental break features breakdancing then cuts back to the dance with the crowd. The video ends with Monica rejecting her lovers kiss while they are seated on the couch.
